items.name: Amour Bistro
items.section_excerpt: Adorned with elegant ambience and romantic lighting, Amour Bistro is one of the best places to eat in Delhi. It is located in Hauz Khas Village and delight visitors with its stylish interior and peaceful atmosphere. Known for serving visitors exquisite European and continental dishes, the restaurant has been a famous place among couples. Enjoy a delightful selection of wines and cocktails, as well…
items.description: Adorned with elegant ambience and romantic lighting, Amour Bistro is one of the best places to eat in Delhi. It is located in Hauz Khas Village and delight visitors with its stylish interior and peaceful atmosphere. Known for serving visitors exquisite European and continental dishes, the restaurant has been a famous place among couples. Enjoy a delightful selection of wines and cocktails, as well as delightful meals.
items.location_hint: Block C, No.10 Yes Bank, 48, Malcha Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110021
query_hints: Amour Bistro Block C, No.10 Yes Bank, 48, Malcha Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110021
items.source_title: List of Top 33Romantic Places in Delhi

items.name: Saket’s Select CITYWALK Rooftop Cafes
items.section_excerpt: If you are looking for the best cafes to enjoy some live music and delicious meals then Saket's Select Citywalk Rooftop Cafes are among the top places to eat in Delhi. The menus are loaded with a variety of dishes that are worth trying, and enjoy an amazing dine-in experience in Delhi. The ambience of the cafes will surely delight your eyes and senses. Guests can also enjoy the panoramic vistas of…
items.description: If you are looking for the best cafes to enjoy some live music and delicious meals then Saket's Select Citywalk Rooftop Cafes are among the top places to eat in Delhi. The menus are loaded with a variety of dishes that are worth trying, and enjoy an amazing dine-in experience in Delhi. The ambience of the cafes will surely delight your eyes and senses. Guests can also enjoy the panoramic vistas of the city from these rooftop cafes.

items.name: Bukhara
items.section_excerpt: Serving a delicious North Indian Cuisine to guests, Bukhara is among the best places to eat in Delhi for couples. The restaurant is located in the ITC Maurya Hotel and is adorned with an elegant ambiance. From delicious Kebabs to gourmet dishes, everything is available in extraordinary taste. The ancient decor and calm ambience will surely add an extra dose of romance to your trip. If you are look…
items.description: Serving a delicious North Indian Cuisine to guests, Bukhara is among the best places to eat in Delhi for couples. The restaurant is located in the ITC Maurya Hotel and is adorned with an elegant ambiance. From delicious Kebabs to gourmet dishes, everything is available in extraordinary taste. The ancient decor and calm ambience will surely add an extra dose of romance to your trip. If you are looking for a romantic dine-in experience in Delhi, then Bukhara is the best place to visit.
items.location_hint: ITC Maurya, Diplomatic Enclave, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, Delhi 110021

items.name: The Tea Room
items.section_excerpt: Offering a serene ambiance and the delightful dishes, The Tea Room is one of the top romantic places in Delhi. It is the top place for intimate conversations and spending some quality time with your loved ones. From refreshing drinks to savoury pastries, this cafe is an ideal choice for those looking for an amazing place to eat in Delhi. Want to spend some cosy moments with your partner? The Tea R…
items.description: Offering a serene ambiance and the delightful dishes, The Tea Room is one of the top romantic places in Delhi. It is the top place for intimate conversations and spending some quality time with your loved ones. From refreshing drinks to savoury pastries, this cafe is an ideal choice for those looking for an amazing place to eat in Delhi. Want to spend some cosy moments with your partner? The Tea Room is the perfect place to go.

items.name: Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura
items.section_excerpt: Looking for a royal dining experience in the heart of Delhi? Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura is among the top places to eat in Delhi. They serve delicious Mughlai flavours that will surely amuse your taste buds. With heartwarming and welcoming staff, Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura make the guests feel like home by adding an extra dose of royality in their dining experience. If you love Delhi's Mughlai food t…
items.description: Looking for a royal dining experience in the heart of Delhi? Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura is among the top places to eat in Delhi. They serve delicious Mughlai flavours that will surely amuse your taste buds. With heartwarming and welcoming staff, Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura make the guests feel like home by adding an extra dose of royality in their dining experience. If you love Delhi's Mughlai food then this is the top place to visit with your partner.

query_hints: Lakhori-Haveli Dharampura 2293, Gali Anar, Dharam Pura, Old Delhi, Delhi, 110006
